verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Krupaasimhaasa nundaa alpha omega Neevegaa krupaa daapuna jeri nutincheda{/lang-eng}
{lang-tel}కృపాసింహాసనుండా అల్ఫా ఓమేగా నీవేగా కృపా దాపునజేరి నుతించెద{/lang-tel}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Idigo samastamunu nootanamuga cheyuchunnaanu Idigo modambu kaluga jeseda{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Daiva vaakyamu gaikoni jeevinchi jayinchuvaani daiva Devaalaya stambhamugaa jetun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Daaveedu thaalamu galigi naa devuni peru vraaseda Daaveedu jeevimpa jethun nepudachata{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Satya swaroopuni naa kroththa peru vaanipai Vraatun satya satyamu nandu nadipintun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paralokamunu digivachchu parishudda pattanamu Peru paramuriyuchu vaanipai vraatun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Uttamudu Yehovaa krotha geetamu paadudi uttamudu Putrudesuni mana kosagen{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thandriki priyudesu andaga nundenu thandri Thandriki menduga naatmatho ninden{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Siluvapai praanamidenu viluva samaadhi Nunchabade siluvapai gelichi leche sajeevundai{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ghanudaina priyudesu deenula yaadarinchunu Ghanu vinayamutho manalanu pilichen{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ullambulu ranjille ellappudu prabhu manatho Nunda ulla Halleluya paadedamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: o1
